Sentencas: A hybrid direct carbon fuel cell (DCFC) with a combination of molten carbon and solid oxide fuel cell attracts more attention as a new energy device.
Titulo: The function of carbonate in a hybrid direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: The oxidation mechanism in this system has not been better understood.
Titulo: The function of carbonate in a hybrid direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: In this paper, we have designed a cell configuration with movable wires to allow the distance between the anode current collector and the anode layer to be adjusted.
Titulo: The function of carbonate in a hybrid direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: The experimental results showed that the series resistance of the cell depends on the position of the current collector, while the polarisation resistance stayed unchanged indicating a possible extension from a two-dimensional zone to a three-dimensional zone in the event of any carbon oxidation.
Titulo: The function of carbonate in a hybrid direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: The revolution of the open-circuit voltage (OCV) with temperature and its value at different operating temperatures were tested.
Titulo: The function of carbonate in a hybrid direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: The presence of the carbonate not only increased the OCV of the cell but also improved its resistance.
Titulo: The function of carbonate in a hybrid direct carbon fuel cell

Sentencas: The increased OCV and improved cell resistance demonstrate that the carbonate has played a critical role in the electrochemical reactions.
Titulo: The function of carbonate in a hybrid direct carbon fuel cell
